rukus.text: Yalli xiibitak iyyeh; Nabii Nuuc neh seeceh kay maral qokol kaah nakkem keh, tokkel nanu kaa oggola marak yayse mara kinnino
Kaadu kaa kee kay buxah maraay, moominiiniy kaâ luk teemene kaxxa gibdak naggosneh (leet xuunumaanamak, sutaanamak)
Kaadu kay samad raaqe mara ken abne, kay mari leet bayeek gamadal
Kaadu meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne ellecabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
Sinam addal Nabii Nuucuh saayaay nagaynan cabne
Diggah nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah Nabii Nuuc ni-naqoosay teemeney Yallah qibaadá caglissek numuk teyna
Tohuk lakal aki maray kaa dirabboyse leet xuumusneeh (sutusne) finqisne
Kaadu diggah kay (Nabii Nuuc kinnuk) gital kaa kataate marat Nabii Ibraahim yan
Isi Rabbil saytun sorkocô baxa luk yemeete waqdi Yallat agleyta haamak
Isi abbaa kee isi marak Yallak kalah maca taqbudeniih iyye waqdi ken assacakkuk
Yallak kalah gersi yallitte diraabah taqbudenim faxxaanaa
Tohul ginô Rabbi maca siinik abelem takkaleeniih, Yallak kalihim tuqbudeenik
Tokkel ken qiidih keenil luk yawqeemik malkitih cutuukâ fanah wagittoh wagga hee
Edde luk diggah anu biyaakitah keenik iyye
Edde luk derre kaat cabba heenih gexen
Eddeluk ken yallitte fan sissikuk kelli iyyeeh (malgiyeh) matakmaanaa? iyye keenil anqasak
Maca liton kah yaabe waytaanaah essero yol kah gacse waytaanam keenik iyye Nabii Ibraahim
Edde luk Nabii Ibraahim keenit yufkuneh migdi gabah godmat ken aagaruk
Tokkel sissikuk naqabu luk kay mari kaah fan yufkuneeh nanu tet naqbudeeh, atu tet taggilee kaak iyyen
Isin sinni gabah urtaanam taqbudeenii, sin gine Rabbî qibaadá cabba hayteenih keenik iyye
Yalli sin kee isin abba haytaanam gineh anuk
Nabii Ibraahim Yaabah keenik yeyse waqdi, tokkel kay mari uma malah kaah malseeh xiso kaah xisaay jaciim deqsitta girát kaa gasiya (qambisa) iyyen
Kay mari uma malah kaah malseeh, guba raaqa mara ken abneeh, Nabii Ibraahim girák amaanah yewqe
Kaadu Nabii Ibraahim iyyeh; diggah anu guuroh inni Rabbî fan gexaah usuk tirri yoo heele (yoo ascassele)
Nabii Ibraahim Yi-Rabbow meqe marih loowot yan baxa yoh acuw iyye
Eddeluk dooqá kaak oggolleeh kaxxa xiq-le baxal kaa aytikumusne (berrakisne)

Ismaaqil yembeeh barak abballuk taamáh edde gexa caddo yoofe waqdi, yi-baxaw diggah anu soonol koo asguudem ublek, a-caagid wagitey maca kot ceela? Kaak iyye. Yi-babbaw elle amrisimtem ab, wohul Yalli faxek yisbire marih numuh yoo geettok kaak iyye
Edde luk Yallih amri oggolen waqdi (Nabii Ibraahim kee baxa kinnuk) abba seltah (xabanah) kaa oobise kaa yasgaaduh
Kaadu kaa secneh kee Ibraahimow axcuk
Nummah tuble soonó nummasseh, diggah nanu tonnal galatna meqe mara iyye Yalli
Diggah ta-amri (ku baxih masgaada kinnuk) is-baxxaqqa itta aqayyaare kinni
Kaadu nanu kaxxa maruwih (marugih) masgaadal kaa wadne (Ismaaqil kinnuk)
Kaadu Nabii Ibraahimih meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne elle cabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arraabat
Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii Ibraahimil yanay
Nabii Ibraahim kah galatne innah meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah Nabii Ibraahim ni- naqoosay teemenek numuk teyna
Kaadu Nabii Ibraahim Iscaaqh deqsita baxay Nabii yakkuwaay meqe marak numuk teynah yanil kaa ayti-kumusne (berrakisne)
Kaadu kaa (Ibraahim) kee Iscaaqhal barkat oobisne, kaadu ken nammayih samadak isi nafsih meqe num keenik yaniih, baxxaqqa-le dulmih koroosannut isi nafsi yadlume num keenit yanih
